All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
class HTTPThread
extends java.lang.Thread

This is the communication-threads of the HTTPserver.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Bjorn Husberg and Louise Tysk
See Also:
Thread

Method Detail

run

public void run()
This method is called by the start()-method in the Thread-class. It gets a request, parses it and sends the result. Relative paths are ignored.
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread
